message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. As we begin our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $800000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $650000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $700000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $675000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to my business.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $675000. I'm willing to make a slightly larger concession and offer the product to you for $725000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not convinced that $725000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $675000 and $725000, so I'm offering $700000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to my business.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $700000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not convinced that $750000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $700000 and $750000, so I'm offering $725000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to my business.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $725000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $750000, but this is my final offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to your business.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm going to have to pass on your final offer. I'm willing to meet you at $725000, but I'm not willing to go any higher. If you're not willing to sell at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
